com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingPenLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingPenLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingPenLayout
extends LinearLayout
    This class provides the methods for managing Pen settings layout.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenSettingPenLayout.ActionListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen settings events.
      static interface  SpenSettingPenLayout.PresetListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen preset events.
      static interface  SpenSettingPenLayout.SeekBarChangeListener
      This listener interface provides a callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed.
      static interface  SpenSettingPenLayout.ViewListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen settings visibility changed events.

      void setPenImage(String penName, Drawable normalImage, Drawable selectedImage, Drawable focusImage, Drawable presetImage)
      String penName = "com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.FountainPen"; Drawable mNormalImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen); Drawable mSelectedImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen_select); Drawable mFocusImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen_focus); Drawable mPresetImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.pen_preset_montblancpen); mPenSettingView.setPenImage(penName, mNormalImage, mSelectedImage, mFocusImage, mPresetImage);
      void setPenInfoList(List<SpenSettingPenInfo> list)
      set up the pen setting infomation list ArrayList tempPenInfoList = new ArrayList(); List mPenList = new ArrayList(); mPenManager.getInfoList(mPenList); int penCount = mPenList.size(); int penInfoCount = mPenInfoList.size(); for (int i = 0; i < mPenList.size(); i++) { PenInfo penInfo = mPenList.get(i); SpenSettingPenInfo info = new SpenSettingPenInfo(); info.alpha = mPen.getAlpha(); info.color = -16777216; info.advancedSetting = ""; info.isCurvable = true; info.name = penInfo.className; info.size = mPen.getSize(); tempPenInfoList.add(info); mCanvasView.setPenSettingInfo(info); } mPenSettingView.setPenInfoList(tempPenInfoList);
      void setPenList(ArrayList<String> penList)
      private ArrayList mPenList = new ArrayList(); mPenList = mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().getPenList(); ------------- Set Montblanc mode ----------------------------- ArrayList mMontblancPenList = new ArrayList(); mMontblancPenList.add("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancFountainPen"); mMontblancPenList.add("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancCalligraphyPen"); mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().setPenList(mMontblancPenList); -------------- Restore to default list ------------------------ int count = 0; while (count < mPenList.size()) { if (("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancFountainPen".equals(mPenList.get(count))) || ("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancCalligraphyPen".equals(mPenList.get(count)))) { mPenList.remove(count); } else { count++; } } mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().setPenList(mPenList);
      void setPosition(int x, int y)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingPenLayout

        public SpenSettingPenLayout(Context context,
                    String customImagePath,
                    RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Creates an @see SpenSettingPenLayout instance with the specified image file path and relative layout. The following parameters must be not null.
        Pen Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingPenLayout

        public SpenSettingPenLayout(Context context,
                    String customImagePath,
                    RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                    float ratio)
        Creates an @see SpenSettingPenLayout instance with the specified image file path, relative layout, and ratio.
        Pen Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        ratio - [in] The overall size adjustment ratio (This ratio must greater than 0). If ratio is larger than 2.0f, it will be set to 2.0f.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - If ratio is too large, bitmap size exceeds VM budget. Therefore, please consider your ratio carefully, bitmaps can quickly consume your available memory budget leading to an application crash due to the dreaded exception.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setIndicatorPosition

        public void setIndicatorPosition(int x)
        Set the specified position for the popup indicator.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the popup indicator in pixels. If X is less than 0, indicator will be inVisible. If X is greater than setting layout's width, indicator will show on the right side of setting layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getPenList

        public ArrayList<String> getPenList()
        Returns:
        List of pen name that supported in SPen SDK 3.1
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • setPenList

        public void setPenList(ArrayList<String> penList)
         private ArrayList mPenList = new ArrayList();
 mPenList = mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().getPenList();
        ------------- Set Montblanc mode ----------------------------- 
         ArrayList mMontblancPenList = new ArrayList();
 mMontblancPenList.add("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancFountainPen");
 mMontblancPenList.add("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancCalligraphyPen");
 mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().setPenList(mMontblancPenList);
        -------------- Restore to default list ------------------------ 
         int count = 0;
 while (count < mPenList.size()) {
 if (("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancFountainPen".equals(mPenList.get(count)))
 || ("com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.MontblancCalligraphyPen".equals(mPenList.get(count)))) {
 mPenList.remove(count);
 } else {
 count++;
 }
 }
 mSettingView.getPenSettingLayout().setPenList(mPenList);
        Parameters:
        penList - List of pen name to be display on SPen Setting Layout.
        These pen names should be exactly like pen name that you have from API getPenList()
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the penList is null.
        Since:
        3.1.0
        See Also:

      • setPenImage

        public void setPenImage(String penName,
               Drawable normalImage,
               Drawable selectedImage,
               Drawable focusImage,
               Drawable presetImage)
         String penName = "com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.preload.FountainPen";
 
 Drawable mNormalImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen);
 
 Drawable mSelectedImage =
 mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen_select);
 
 Drawable mFocusImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.snote_popup_pensetting_montblancpen_focus);
 
 Drawable mPresetImage = mContext.getResources().getDrawable(R.drawable.pen_preset_montblancpen);
 
 mPenSettingView.setPenImage(penName, mNormalImage, mSelectedImage, mFocusImage, mPresetImage);
        Parameters:
        penName - Name of pen.
        normalImage - Normal drawable image.
        selectedImage - Selected drawable image.
        focusImage - Focus drawable image.
        presetImage - Preset drawable image.
        Drawables must have different reference.
        If one of drawables is null, default images will be used.
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(SpenSettingPenInfo settingInfo)

      • setPenInfoList

        public void setPenInfoList(List<SpenSettingPenInfo> list)
        set up the pen setting infomation list 
         ArrayList tempPenInfoList = new ArrayList();
 List mPenList = new ArrayList();
 
 mPenManager.getInfoList(mPenList);
 
 int penCount = mPenList.size();
 int penInfoCount = mPenInfoList.size();
 
 for (int i = 0; i < mPenList.size(); i++) {
 PenInfo penInfo = mPenList.get(i);
 
 SpenSettingPenInfo info = new SpenSettingPenInfo();
 info.alpha = mPen.getAlpha();
 info.color = -16777216;
 info.advancedSetting = "";
 info.isCurvable = true;
 info.name = penInfo.className;
 info.size = mPen.getSize();
 tempPenInfoList.add(info);
 
 mCanvasView.setPenSettingInfo(info);
 
 }
 
 mPenSettingView.setPenInfoList(tempPenInfoList);
        Parameters:
        list - List The list of Pen settings infomation. com.samsung.android.sdk.pen
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setBeautifyOptionEnabled

        public void setBeautifyOptionEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable beautify option for Pen. This API should be called after init Pen setting view.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable the beautify option for Pen, set to false to disable the beautify option for Pen.
        Since:
        3.0.0
